tier_justification: SEED FILE ERROR: Unit not formed until May 1, 1943 (1943-Q2). This represents a research brief documenting the error rather than actual TO&E data.
narrative_summary: The 2e Division d'Infanterie Marocaine did not exist in 1943-Q1. The division was formed on May 1, 1943 in Morocco (1943-Q2) and never participated in the North Africa campaign. Its first combat deployment was to Italy in November 1943. This entry should be removed from the North Africa seed file.
